thread.section_title: Hotel WO - Wilson Opera - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent staff and good location
thread.title_full: Excellent staff and good location - Review of Hotel WO - Wilson Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: gee7210
title: Excellent staff and good location
text: Booked the hotel online under classic room and upon arrival we were greeted warmly by the staff and we requested for a room with a balcony. The staff checked and fortunate of us there is a room available and we were charged with minimal additional charge for the change. The location of the hotel is near to everywhere you need to go.(shopping/sight seeing/food). Clean and staff are exceptionally helpful for us first timer in Paris! Their warmth really promotes Paris.
